text: Jackie Brown is a 1997 American crime drama movie directed by Quentin Tarantino set in Los Angeles. It is based on a book by Elmore Leonard. It stars Samuel L. Jackson, Pam Grier, Robert De Niro, Robert Forster, Chris Tucker, LisaGay Hamilton, Sid Haig and Bridget Fonda with Michael Keaton. It opened in theaters on December 25, 1997 in the United States. It is almost 154 minutes long. It was distributed by Miramax. == Other websites == * Category:1997 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Film noir Category:American heist movies Category:Movies directed by Quentin Tarantino Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:American independent movies
title: Jackie Brown
